statements: SELECT * FROM translations
SELECT id, text FROM translations WHERE source_language='English'
SELECT text FROM translations WHERE id=1
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE target_language='Spanish' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, source_language, text FROM translations ORDER BY source_language ASC
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English' AND target_language = 'Spanish';
SELECT text, source_language FROM translations WHERE id = 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text, target_language FROM translations WHERE text LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT id, text, source_language, target_language FROM translations ORDER BY target_language ASC, id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_translations FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'French';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English';
SELECT id, text, target_language FROM translations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_version FROM models WHERE model_id > 10 ORDER BY model_version DESC;
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT text, source_language FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'Spanish' AND id < 10;
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE id = 1
SELECT text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'english' AND target_language = 'spanish' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, source_language, target_language FROM translations WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY target_language ASC, id DESC
SELECT * FROM models JOIN translations ON models.training_data_id = translations.id WHERE models.model_version > 1.0
SELECT model_name, text FROM models JOIN translations ON models.training_data_id = translations.id ORDER BY model_id ASC
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT translation_id, translated_text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English';
SELECT translation_id, translated_text FROM translations WHERE target_language = 'French';
SELECT translation_id, translated_text FROM translations ORDER BY translation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM translations JOIN languages ON translations.source_language = languages.language_name;
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE translation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT translation_id, source_language, target_language FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English';
SELECT target_language, COUNT(*) FROM translations GROUP BY target_language;
SELECT translation_history.*, translations.translated_text FROM translation_history JOIN translations ON translation_history.translation_id = translations.translation_id;
SELECT languages.language_name, translations.translated_text FROM languages JOIN translations ON languages.language_name = translations.source_language;
SELECT * FROM Language
SELECT language_code, language_name FROM Language WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Translation LIMIT 5
SELECT translation_text FROM Translation WHERE source_language_id = 2
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM Dataset ORDER BY dataset_size DESC
SELECT * FROM Language WHERE id = 1;
SELECT language_name, language_code FROM Language WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT Translation.translation_text, Language.language_name FROM Translation INNER JOIN Language ON Translation.source_language_id = Language.id;
SELECT * FROM Dataset WHERE dataset_size > 1000 ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT Model.model_name, Dataset.dataset_name FROM Model INNER JOIN Dataset ON Model.dataset_id = Dataset.id;
SELECT * FROM Languages;
SELECT language_name FROM Languages WHERE language_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, source_language_id, target_language_id FROM Models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT pair_id, source_language_id, target_language_id, translation_text FROM TranslationPairs WHERE source_language_id = 2;
SELECT model_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM Metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Models;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM Models WHERE source_language_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, source_language_id, target_language_id FROM Models WHERE model_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT pair_id, source_language_id, target_language_id, translation_text FROM TranslationPairs WHERE pair_id < 10;
SELECT metric_id, model_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM Metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
